0.Major_Activities1:
MES had started its first  public primary school with 40 students in 1984 at Kargil town.The school is the first locally established public schools in the district.
It has now  extended the no. of schools to 14 and the total enrollment has now reached to 3000  in 2018.The branches are spread over different villages of district Kargil,ranging from Drass to Chiktan.Out of 14 branches two schools have been upgraded to Sec level,while and six other schools are upto 8th standard and rest are primary

registeration_info.nr_add: Mutahhary Public School primary Dept. main bazaar kargil ladakh

source_info.purpose:
The Society raises its required funds from local donors as well as donors from outside , besides a nominal amount of funds are being generated from school income . No other source of funding from Govt. has been realized so far.

All recurring income expenditure is full filled by means of the above mentioned source of funding which has helped the society for some extend to manage the academic and other activities of the schools run under the society.
